headline: Marathon, Teamsters reach pay deal at Detroit refinery
summary: "The process to safely welcome our employees back to the refinery is already in progress," the Findlay, Ohio-based company said.  Over 200 Teamsters at Marathon's Detroit refinery had called for the strike on Sept. 4 after months of pay and safety-related negotiations and mediations with the refiner yielded no results.  Marathon representatives and Teamsters had several negotiating sessions under a federal mediator since workers went on strike.

headline: Marathon's Detroit refinery union workers vote to ratify agreement
summary: Teamsters members working at Marathon Petroleum's Detroit refinery have voted to ratify a seven-year collective bargaining agreement, the union said on Sunday. More than 200 Teamsters at...

headline: Three Smaller Energy Stocks See Big Insider Buys
summary: Insiders at Marathon Petroleum, Dorchester Minerals, and Granite Ridge Resources have recently bought up shares.
